about_the_game:
The VIBORA Virus is a highly contagious strain that is ravaging Brazil, bringing with it a sinister and disturbing transformation. Transmitted primarily through direct contact with infected bodily fluids, such as saliva and blood, VIBORA has an alarming transmission rate, spreading rapidly across the country.

Once infected, VIBORA victims experience a series of severe symptoms, including high fever, seizures, and intense hallucinations. However, the most terrifying aspect of this virus is its ability to reprogram the genetic code of host cells, resulting in a bizarre metamorphosis.

As the infection progresses, affected individuals undergo a radical physical transformation. Their human features are distorted and replaced by animal-like traits, creating grotesque and terrifying hybrid beings. Some become creatures with sharp claws and scaly skin, resembling snakes, while others develop membranous wings and glowing eyes, akin to bats. The range of mutations is vast and unpredictable, generating a variety of monsters that haunt the country's streets and jungles.

These new beings, stripped of their humanity and dominated by animal instincts, become relentless predators, hunting any living creature that crosses their path. The government and health authorities are desperately fighting to contain the spread of VIBORA but face enormous challenges due to its rapid dissemination and the unpredictable nature of the mutations.

With Brazil's population on the brink of collapse, the race against time to find a cure or a way to contain the VIBORA Virus becomes a desperate battle for humanity's survival.

  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600 ou AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 / GTX 1650 ou AMD Radeon™ RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
